GUIDE

Framer AI Website Builder: Complete Guide

Complete guide to Framer AI website builder. Learn how to use Framer for beautiful designs, features, pricing, and code export.

Framer at a Glance

Overall Score: 8.8/10

Design Quality: 9.5/10 (Best)

Ease of Use: 7.5/10

Starting Price: $15/month

Best For: Design quality

Unique Feature: Code export

Page Speed: Excellent

Free Trial: 14 days

Framer Key Features

AI Site Generation

Generate complete websites with AI assistance using natural language

Fast creation of beautiful, modern websites

Code Export

Export clean React, HTML, and CSS for self-hosting or development

Full portability and custom development flexibility

Beautiful Templates

Modern, trendy templates with stunning visual design

Professional results that impress visitors

Fast Performance

Optimized for speed with excellent PageSpeed scores

Better SEO and user experience

CMS Capabilities

Built-in content management for blogs and dynamic content

Easy content updates without technical skills

Animations

Smooth animations and micro-interactions built-in

Modern, engaging user experiences

How to Use Framer: Step by Step

1

Choose a Template or Use AI

Start with a beautiful template or use AI generation by describing your project. Templates are organized by industry and use case.

2

Customize with Visual Editor

Use the intuitive drag-and-drop editor to customize everything. Change layout, colors, fonts, images, and content with ease.

3

Add Pages and Content

Create additional pages using the page builder. Add CMS collections for blogs, case studies, or dynamic content.

4

Add Interactions and Animations

Framer makes it easy to add smooth animations, hover effects, and micro-interactions that delight users.

5

Publish or Export

Publish to Framer hosting or export code (paid plans) for self-hosting or custom development.

What Framer is Best For

Design Portfolios

Showcase creative work with stunning visual presentations

Why Framer: Beautiful designs, smooth animations, modern aesthetics

Marketing Sites

High-converting landing pages and marketing websites

Why Framer: Fast loading, impressive visuals, smooth interactions

SaaS Startups

Professional websites for software and technology companies

Why Framer: Modern design aesthetic, developer-friendly, code export

Agency Work

Client websites with fast delivery and impressive results

Why Framer: Beautiful results justify higher pricing, code export available

Framer Pros and Cons

Pros

  • ✓Best design quality (9.5/10)
  • ✓Code export (React, HTML, CSS)
  • ✓Fast performance and PageSpeed
  • ✓Modern, trendy templates
  • ✓Smooth animations and interactions
  • ✓Affordable for the quality ($15-35/mo)
  • ✓Developer-friendly

Cons

  • ✗Learning curve (7.5/10 ease)
  • ✗No native e-commerce
  • ✗Design skills help
  • ✗Code export requires paid plan
  • ✗Limited CMS vs Webflow
  • ✗Templates can feel similar

Framer Pricing

  • Free: 14-day trial with full feature access. Perfect for testing.
  • Basic ($15/mo): 2 published sites, basic features, code export included.
  • Pro ($25/mo): 10 published sites, advanced features, priority support.
  • Premium ($35/mo): Unlimited sites, all features, team collaboration.
  • Annual billing: Save up to 20% by paying annually.
  • All paid plans include: Code export, custom domains, SSL, no Framer branding.

Framer Success Tips

  • Start with templates: Templates are professionally designed. Customize rather than building from scratch.
  • Learn the keyboard shortcuts: Speed up your workflow with Framer's powerful shortcuts.
  • Use animations tastefully: Less is more. Subtle animations enhance rather than distract.
  • Leverage the CMS: Use CMS collections for blogs, case studies, or portfolios.
  • Test on mobile: Preview mobile view frequently. Most traffic is mobile.
  • Use code export wisely: Export for custom hosting or as a starting point for development.

Framer delivers the most beautiful designs with code export flexibility. Try the free trial.
